description: An integrated gas emission node allows the user to fire a volatile glob of fluid will be launched from the user's mouth, nearly instantly dispersing into a targeted cone of gas. The chemicals emitted are dependent on integrated fluid reserves.

When active, this bionic will continuously disperse gasses into the surrounding atmosphere. The chemicals emitted are dependent on integrated fluid reserves. A small label is placed on one of the outer vents reading: 'WARNING: System activation floods the surrounding area, including the user, with stored chemicals. USE WITH CAUTION'
When active, this bionic will allow the user to begin manufacturing and storing certain chemicals over time. Extended chemical synthesizing may lead to adverse health effects for the user.

When powered, a swarm of neural drones will optimize the functionality of your brain, boosting mental abilities by 50%, at the cost of significantly increasing your metabolism and bionic power. Halting this process will have severe consequences for the user.
